imageAlt: A mockup showing the landing page of the Code Labs project
title: Code Labs
description_content: As my final year project, I build a microservices-based platform for professors and students in my college.
The platform allows teachers to create, monitor and grade programming-based learning activities for their students.

imageAlt: A mockup showing the map and combat interface of the Loomies project
title: Loomies (A pokemon go-like game)
description_content: My featured contributions were enabling real-time message passing for in-game battles and implementing the continuous integration and deployment pipelines.

imageAlt: A mockup showing the landing page of the Capyfile project
title: Capyfile (A cloud storage SaaS)
description_content: As a front-end developer, I built most of the Web client using React and created end-to-end tests with Playwright.
I also contributed to the back-end by implementing a REST micro-service in Scala and some of the continuous integration pipelines.

imageAlt: A mockup showing the single page interface of the search engine project
title: Search engine
description_content: In this project, I built a web scraper in Golang to collect data from Youtube videos and then indexed it in Elasticsearch.
A front-end interface was developed with React to allow users to search for videos and display the results.

imageAlt: A mockup showing the product page of the Wearcar project
title: Wearcar (An e-commerce of car accessories)
description_content: I contributed to both the back-end, implementing stored procedures, triggers, and views in MySQL, and the front-end, developing sections of the website using EJS.
I was involved in a team that had to use the SCRUM methodology to manage the project.
